definition: Tao Xingzhi (1891-1946), Chinese educator and reformer
surname Tao
pottery/pleased

sentences.english: China educator Tao Xingzhi thinks that life is education.
sentences.chinese: 我国教育家陶行知认为生活即教育。

sentences.english: Memorial Hall of Tao Xingzhi is famous for beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 陶行知纪念馆以风景优美著称。

sentences.english: It was this cultural idea that laid the foundation of Tao Xingzhi's thought on the social reform.
sentences.chinese: 这种中西文化观念奠定了陶行知社会改造思想的基础。

sentences.english: As the pioneer of Chinese modern creative education, Tao Xingzhi.
sentences.chinese: 陶行知先生是我国近代创造教育的开创者。

sentences.english: "Combination of Teaching, Learning and Working" is the important part of the educational thoughts of TAO Xingzhi.
sentences.chinese: “教学做合一”是陶行知教育思想的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Chen Heqin and Tao Xingzhi, the co-founders of Nanjing Xiaozhuang Normal School, were lifetime comrades and close friends.
sentences.chinese: 教育家陈鹤琴先生与陶行知是一生的同志与挚友。

sentences.english: Creative education thought is important especially among Mr. Tao Xingzhi rich education thought.
sentences.chinese: 陶行知先生丰富的教育思想中创造教育思想尤为重要。

sentences.english: Tao Xingzhi is a famous people's educationist in China's modern education history.
sentences.chinese: 陶行知先生是我国现代教育史上著名的人民教育家。

sentences.english: It was this cultural idea that laid the foundation of Tao Xingzhi's thought of the whole social reform.
sentences.chinese: 这种文化观念奠定了陶行知社会改造思想的基础。

sentences.english: Tao Xingzhi is the inaugurator of educational thoughts of creation.
sentences.chinese: 陶行知先生是我国近代创造教育的开创者。

Lu Xun (1881-1936), one of the earliest and best-known modern Chinese writers
Su Buqing (1902-2003), Chinese mathematician
Zou Taofen (1895-1944), journalist, political theorist and publisher
educationalist
Wu Yuzhang (1878-1966), writer, educator and communist politician
Liang Qichao (1873-1929), influential journalist and a leader of the failed reform movement of 1898
Zhu Ziqing (1898-1948), poet and essayist
Zhang Taiyan (1869-1936), scholar, journalist, revolutionary and leading intellectual around the time of the Xinhai revolution
